Question: In 1997, Cook tried to sue this person for $20 million for allegedly blocking a tell-all book about their alleged relationship.
Hints: "I understand why people think we're gay", this person says in the August 2006 issue of O magazine.
In 2006, rappers Ludacris, 50 Cent and Ice Cube criticized this person for what they perceived as an anti-hip hop bias.
At 13, after suffering years of abuse, this person ran away from home.
